title: Unrestricted CORS Policy - Security Risk
description: The dashboard server allows requests from any origin with CORS(app, origins=['*']). This could allow malicious websites to access internal system data.
recommendation: Restrict CORS to specific trusted origins or use authentication

title: Server Binds to All Network Interfaces
description: The dashboard server binds to 0.0.0.0, making it accessible from any network interface. Combined with unrestricted CORS, this creates significant security exposure.
recommendation: Bind to localhost (127.0.0.1) unless external access is specifically required

title: Bare Except Clause - Poor Error Handling
description: Using bare 'except:' catches all exceptions including SystemExit and KeyboardInterrupt, which can mask critical errors and make debugging difficult.
recommendation: Use specific exception types or at least 'except Exception:'

title: Command Injection Protection Verified
description: The autonomous-system.py properly validates tmux commands against a whitelist before execution, preventing command injection attacks.
recommendation: Good security practice already in place

title: Git Worktree Validation Implemented
description: The coordinator server properly validates branch names to prevent command injection in git worktree operations.
recommendation: Good security practice already in place

title: Missing Rate Limiting on Public API
description: The dashboard-public.py exposes APIs without rate limiting, which could lead to DoS attacks or resource exhaustion.
recommendation: Implement rate limiting using Flask-Limiter or similar

title: No Authentication on Dashboard API
description: The dashboard API endpoints are publicly accessible without any authentication mechanism.
recommendation: Add API key or JWT authentication for dashboard access

title: Deprecated datetime.utcnow() Usage
description: Using datetime.utcnow() which is deprecated. Should use timezone-aware datetime objects.

title: Multiple Agent Registration Files Found
description: There are multiple agent registration JSON files in mcp-coordinator directory which could lead to confusion about active agents.
recommendation: Clean up old registration files and maintain single source of truth

title: Inconsistent Error Logging
description: Some exceptions are logged with exc_info=True while others are not, making debugging inconsistent.
recommendation: Standardize error logging with exc_info=True for all exceptions
